title: a1278 early 2011 running slow random restarts
message: Hey, I'm helping one of my local shops i work with on a customers a1278 2011.  He got a log report and was wondering if anyone can make anything from it? he was doing an osx install when he developed the report but the customer was already reporting it was crashing in osx. I'm having him run asd if it will manage to load into it.  anyway i'm uploading the log

title: a1278 early 2011 running slow random restarts
message:
No Title

okay it took 2 times running os asd and he got an error he did not send me everything but this photo so i asked him for more.

title: a1278 early 2011 running slow random restarts
message: That error means either the DC in board is bad, the charger is bad, or the charger is not plugged in (most commonly)

title: a1278 early 2011 running slow random restarts
message: Sorry i should have posted back here. he was getting that error because he was using a 85W charger.  he is getting no error in either asd and i had him run it a bunch of times.  at this point idk what the issue is

title: a1278 early 2011 running slow random restarts
message: Could be anything. External boot ok? Bad HDD cable. Bad RAM, bad RAM slot. If none of those it is pretty much hopeless.
